data.question: What is the effect of the phase transition on the space filling of the structure?
data.answer: The space filling increases in the low-temperature phase due to a reduction in the distance between neighboring bipy bridges.

data.question: What is the significance of the crystal-to-crystal transformations being reversible?
data.answer: It indicates that the structure can switch between phases without losing its crystalline character.
